text: انا نحن نزلنا عليك القرءان تنزيلا

translations.translation: It is We who have sent the Qur'an down to you little by little.
We have revealed the Qur'an to you gradually;
(O Prophet), indeed We have revealed the Qur'an to you in portions.
(Muhammad), We have revealed the Quran to you in gradual steps.
Indeed We have sent down the Qur’an upon you, in stages.
Verily, it is We Who have sent down the Qur'an to you by stages.
Surely We Ourselves have revealed the Quran to you revealing (it) in portions.
Surely We have sent down the Koran on thee, a sending down;
Lo! We, even We, have revealed unto thee the Qur'an, a revelation;
Truly, it is We who have revealed to you the Quran, a gradual revelation.
Verily We! it is We Who have revealed Unto thee the Qur'an, a gradual revelation.
Indeed We have sent down to you the Quran in a gradual descent.
It is We Who have sent down the Qur'an to thee by stages.
Verily! It is We Who have sent down the Quran to you (O Muhammad SAW) by stages.
We have indeed, sent down to you the Koran, a (clear) sending,
It is We who sent down the Quran upon you—a gradual revelation.
Indeed, it is We who have sent down to you, [O Muhammad], the Qur'an progressively.

[76:23] Assuredly We (nahnu reiterates the subject of innā, ‘assuredly, for the purpose of emphasis; alternatively it is a separating pronoun) have revealed the Qur’ān to you as a gradual revelation (tanzīlan is the predicate of inna, ‘assuredly’), in other words, We have divided it into parts instead of not revealing it all at once.
716 (Lo! We, even We, have revealed unto thee the Qur'an) We have sent you Gabriel with the Qur'an, (a revelation) in instalments: one, two and three verses at a time;

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
خاطبهم سبحانه خطاب امتنان ورحمة على وجه التعطف والتلطف فقال: { إِنَّا } بمقتضى فضلنا وجودنا { نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ } يا أكمل الرسل تأييداً لك
 وتعظيماً لشأنك { ٱلْقُرْآنَ } الحاوي لما في الكتب السالفة
 المحتوي لجميع الكمالات اللائقة لعموم الأنبياء والرسل
 المجتازين في سبيل التوحيد { تَنزِيلاً } [الإنسان: 23] مفرقاً منجماً على مقتضى الحكمة البالغة الباعثة على إنزالها حسب حاجتك إليها
 وانكشافك بما فيها
 لتتدرج في سلوكك وشهودك
